thread.section_title: Comfort Inn Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Everything was amazing
thread.title_full: Everything was amazing - Review of Comfort Inn Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: wellar79
title: Everything was amazing
text:
Everything was amazing at this hotel, very comphy beds, complementary breakfast, pretty close to time square, the ladies working the front desk were the best though, had so much knowledge and always had an answer for all our questions, we will definitely be coming back to NY and staying at this hotel....
LOVE FROM THE 6
